title: Pradhan launches ‘Bodhan AI’ to build Bharat EduAI Stack
description: Union education minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Thursday launched the Centre of Excellence (CoE) in Artificial Intelligence (AI) for education, named ‘Bodhan AI’| India News
content: Launched during the two-day Bharat Bodhan AI Conclave 2026 at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi, Bodhan AI set up at Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Madras, will create the Bharat EduAI Stack — an open digital public infrastructure (DPI) designed to ... [3115 chars]

title: UN approves 40-member scientific panel on impact of artificial intelligence over US objections
description: The UN General Assembly has voted overwhelmingly to approve a 40-member global scientific panel on the impacts and risks of artificial intelligence, with the United States strongly objecting. Ukraine said it abstained because it objected to Russias Andrei Neznamov, an expert in AI regulation, ethics, and governance, being on the panel.

title: Google says Deep Think AI can partner on advanced math, science
description: Alphabet Inc has updated its Gemini Deep Think artificial intelligence model for better performance in math and science research, the company said.
content:
